name: Aquiline Capital Partners
overview: Aquiline Capital Partners is a private equity firm specializing in investments in the financial services industry. The firm prefers to make investments in risk-bearing and services enterprises in sectors such as property and casualty insurance, banking, finance, securities, asset management, life insurance, operations, financial technology, and transaction processing. The firm invests globally. Aquiline Capital Partners LLC was founded in 2005 and is based in New York, New York.

funding_round.source_description: Belgian Online Payments Business Clear2Pay Gets $75 Million VC Funding
